common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: API to obtain buyer submitted invoice info for VN, TH and PH local sellers only.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"queries","limits":"","required":"yes","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"220314U0G6UNMN","type":"string","required":"True","key":"heCfPcG"}],"description":"","key":"SRbmMfT"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"220314U0G6UNMN","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pidYGXQ"},{"description":"

Type of invoice requested: {1: personal, 2: company}.

","name":"invoice_type","sample":"personal","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ydCfHkD"},{"description":"

Invoice info submitted by buyer. Might be masked, e.g. A****b, depending on order status.

","name":"invoice_detail","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"wbCYwab","children":[{"description":"

Buyer name (only has value when invoice_type is personal)

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"name","sample":"Tom Jerry","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zfsjFXt"},{"description":"

Buyer email address (only has value when invoice_type is personal)

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"email","sample":"tom.and.jerry@gmail.com","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jmTNzWY"},{"description":"

Buyer phone number

- TH only

","name":"phone_number","sample":"(+66) 828918689","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EsQzKfx"},{"description":"

only has value when invoice_type is personal. 

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"tax_id","sample":"1234567898","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HSpdwf"},{"description":"

Buyer address in format \"Street & number, city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer\" (only has value when invoice_type is personal)

- PH, VN only

","name":"address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b, Długi Bród, 17200, PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"Hebfz"},{"description":"

Same function as the address, only having a different field name for TH.Buyer address in format \"Street & number, city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer\" (only has value when invoice_type is personal).

","name":"id_card_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b, Długi Bród, 17200, PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BGXbHms"},{"description":"

Buyer address breakdown.

- TH, PH only

","name":"address_breakdown","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"GjBmcYp","children":[{"description":"

Return region value

- PH, TH only

","name":"region","sample":"Thailand","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mJKjtiK"},{"description":"

Return value

- TH: Province

","name":"state","sample":"Małopolskie","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ahxjabk"},{"description":"

Return value

- TH: District

","name":"city","sample":"Myślenicki","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mPyimxz"},{"description":"

Return value

- TH: Sub district

","name":"town","sample":"Łęki","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DErGBfw"},{"description":"

Return value

- TH: Postal code

- PH: Postal code

","name":"postcode","sample":"17200","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RNHkeC"},{"description":"

Return value

- PH: Additional details, i.e. street name, building

- TH: Additional details, i.e. house number

","name":"detailed_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FyZpANk"},{"description":"

Return value:

- Empty for PH, TH

","name":"additional_info","sample":"PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"aRyFHaz"},{"description":"

- only has value when invoice_type is personal

- Buyer address in format \"detailed_address, town, district, state, postcode, additional_info\" for all regions

--- for TH: leave the 'additional_info' as empty

","name":"full_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b, Łęki, 17200, PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dwniXcT"}]},{"description":"

- return value for TH only (only has value when invoice_type is company)

","name":"company_head_office","sample":"yes","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fcCFaSY"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"company_name","sample":"Michal Orwinski S.C.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NPwQtPz"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- TH only

","name":"company_branch_name","sample":"CIty A branch","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pGZFWe"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- TH only

","name":"company_branch_id","sample":"123","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FRwCBWt"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- TH only

","name":"company_type","sample":"head office","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XyabmPd"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"company_email","sample":"michal@shopee.com","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JswKtyN"},{"description":"

- Only return value when invoice type is company

- VN, TH, PH only

","name":"company_tax_id","sample":"123456789","type":"string","required":null,"key":"tKQCMX"},{"description":"

Buyer address in format \"Street & number,city, zipcode, any additional info provided by buyer\" (only has value when invoice_type is company)

- VN, TH only

","name":"company_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b, Długi Bród, 17200, PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"SRbWzJd"},{"description":"

Company address breakdown

- PH, TH only

","name":"company_address_breakdown","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"aEBdECk","children":[{"description":"

Return region value

- PH, TH only

","name":"company_region","sample":"Thailand","type":"string","required":null,"key":"AmXmRdJ"},{"description":"

Return value

- PH: Province

- TH: Province

","name":"company_state","sample":"Małopolskie","type":"string","required":null,"key":"rCCkSGH"},{"description":"

Return value

- PH: City

","name":"company_city","sample":"Myślenicki","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ddYnnaS"},{"description":"

Return value

- PH: Barangay

- TH: District

","name":"company_district","sample":"Myślenice","type":"string","required":null,"key":"feJdHAs"},{"description":"

Return value

- TH: Sub district

","name":"company_town","sample":"Łęki","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jWJHfz"},{"description":"

Return postal code

- TH, PH only

","name":"company_postcode","sample":"17200","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xXkNMth"},{"description":"

Return value

- PH: Detailed address

- TH: Detailed address

","name":"company_detailed_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EFzZEXM"},{"description":"

Return value:

- Empty for PH, TH

","name":"company_additional_info","sample":"PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CeQkJk"},{"description":"

Concatenation of company address breakdown

- only has value when invoice_type is company



","name":"company_full_address","sample":"GieŁdowa 4b, Łęki, 17200, PIĄTE PIĘTRO","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WJXetxX"}]}]},{"description":"

Error in retrieving the receipt setting of a particular order.

","name":"error","sample":"order not found","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QysKtHH"},{"description":"

To identify order with and without buyer request, applicable to PL.

","name":"is_requested","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"riyhMDN"}],"type":"object[]","name":"invoice_info_list","description":"","key":"KrdGShd"},{"description":"

Request id for debugging purposes

","name":"request_id","sample":"ZQKEZfwaNQUnMKqMmjWuRPybfshyFygV","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RmjstGx"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"common.error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KCjtfXX"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QzzyPzd"}]}
